Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: A group of influential people in Australia has joined forces to urge the government to increase support rates in the upcoming budget. They believe it is time to raise the rate for good and ensure dignity for those on JobSeeker Youth Allowance and related payments. Several rallies were held and an open letter was signed by parliamentarians academics business leaders and community advocates. The former Treasury secretary even said it was cruel to not #raisetherate. It remains to be seen if the government will listen to these voices calling for change.
